column4: I am having a recurrent problem with my window buttons disappearing globally. No minimize, no close buttons etc. Any Ideas on why this would be? Doesn't always happen. Kinda sporadic.
Have you looked at the window buttons' values in gconf-editor?
ah you beat me to the followup question
hmm don't know whats right and/or wrong on this gconf settings
that was me, no space in value
do the buttons show up with other themes?
bronteee: ok so it works on another user...but the top action bar of Ubuntu is still slightly messed up.
how would I go about doing that?
hm... if you remember the package names for the themes you downloaded, you could try apt-get --reinstall
no I don't want the themes anymore. It was just an experiment anyway
don't remember the names. it was a whole load of stuff I did to give my desktop the appearance of a Mac. But I decided I hate macs so went back to good ol Ubuntu
